function_reachability: Is it impossible for function 'sort' to reach function 'swap'?
Is it impossible for function 'swap' to reach function 'main'?
loop_reachability: Can the loop with condition 'i < num - 1' be skipped entirely?
Is the loop with condition 'i < num - 1' always executed?
Can the loop with condition 'j < num - 1' be skipped entirely?
Is the loop with condition 'j < num - 1' always executed?
dominators: Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'i < num - 1' without passing through its header block?
Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'j < num - 1' without passing through its header block?
data_dependency: Is variable 'a (line 2)' used after its definition?
Is variable 'b (line 2)' used after its definition?
liveness: Does variable 'b' remain in use at the end of function 'swap'?
Does variable 'a' remain in use at the end of function 'swap'?
dead_code: Can the statement 'printf("¥n");' be considered dead code?
Is this statement not dead: “printf("%3d", data[i]);”?
